system.description:
Effect: [Linked Attack: Spit Up][Linked Attack: Swallow]

The user gains 1 @Affliction[stockpile] Stack for 5 activations. A @Affliction[stockpile] Stack raises the user's DEF and SPDEF stage by +1. The user may only have a maximum of 3 @Affliction[stockpile] Stacks at a time.

actions.name: Stockpile
